name: Hope Sewn Patchwork Blanket
description:
This a very fun and special project I've been working on - the Hope patchwork blanket! 

Featuring cotton handprinted and designed fabric from the women's vocational training center in Ghana on one side and your choice of either black or cream 100% Kona cotton (with Oeko-tex certification) on the reverse, with a natural cotton batting making it thick and cozy. 

Cuddle up in style and know that your purchase has helped women in Ghana learn a trade that they can practice in their communities and contribute to the well-being of their families. 

Machine washable on cold, hang to dry or tumble dry on low. 

Measures 67" x 51", Colors and patchwork designs vary with each blanket.

name: Umi Sling Baby Carrier: Handprinted Cotton-Linen Blend (Block Print)
description:
The Umi Sling is a modern, customizable, functional ring sling made with the highest quality fabrics, ranging from organic cotton to fair-trade Guatemalan cotton, to a luxurious and unique hand-printed cotton/linen blend.

Combining my love with unique textiles and babywearing resulted in these special edition handprinted ring slings. This stamp is carved by hand. 

The Umi Sling can be used to wear newborns through toddlers (8-30 lbs). The sling is fully adjustable and the tail can be used as a nursing cover, too! Each sling is one-size (76"). 

Each ring sling is currently made-to-order, please allow for 2 weeks from the time your order is placed. If you need a rush order, please contact me! 

Care: Machine wash cold, dry on low heat or line dry. The cotton-linen blend starts off stiff but gets softer with wear and washing, and throwing some tennis balls in the low dryer cycle is highly recommended! The more you wear it, the softer it becomes. 

Printed instructions will accompany your sling. Learn how to thread your ring sling and more by clicking the Babywearing Basics tab.

Note of Caution: Babies that are younger than twelve weeks, premature, less than 8 lbs, or with respiratory problems, low tone, or developmental delays have a higher risk of suffocation. Please consult with your medical provider before using any baby sling or carrier. Always make sure that baby's airways are unobstructed and he is breathing properly. You should be always be able to "kiss the top of his head."

description:

Printed instructions will accompany your sling. Learn how to thread your ring sling and more by clicking the Babywearing Basics tab.

name: Umi Sling Baby Carrier: Organic Cotton Ring Sling with Chevron Accent
description:
Do you think something as simple as a piece of fabric can change a village?

We believe it can help.

The 100% organic cotton Umi Sling will help be a catalyst for change in rural Papua New Guinea. For every Umi Sling sold, one will also be given to a mother in need through Project Baby Bilum (learn more by clicking the Project Baby Bilum tab).

This is babywearing with a purpose.

The Umi Sling is a modern, customizable, functional ring sling made with 100% organic cotton and can be used to wear newborns through toddlers (8-30 lbs). The sling is fully adjustable and easy to tote along on any adventure. The tail can be used as a nursing cover, too! Each sling is one-size and the tail can be wrapped to shorten, if desired. 

The Umi Sling is currently made-to-order, please allow for 2 weeks from the time your order is placed. If you need a rush order, please contact me! 

Care: Machine wash cold, dry on low heat or line dry.

Printed instructions will accompany your sling. Learn how to thread your ring sling and more by clicking the Babywearing Basics tab. 

Note of Caution: Babies that are younger than twelve weeks, premature, less than 8 lbs, or with respiratory problems, low tone, or developmental delays have a higher risk of suffocation. Please consult with your medical provider before using any baby sling or carrier. Always make sure that baby's airways are unobstructed and he is breathing properly. You should be always be able to "kiss the top of his head."

name: Umi Sling Baby Carrier: Handprinted Batiks {Seafoam}
description:
The Umi Sling is a modern, customizable, functional ring sling made with the highest quality fabrics. The newest line of handmade Batiks is sourced through a women's vocational training center in Ghana.

The Umi Sling can be used to wear newborns through toddlers (8-30 lbs). The sling is fully adjustable and easy to tote along on any adventure. The tail can be used as a nursing cover, too! Each sling is one-size (76") and the tail can be wrapped to shorten, if desired.

The Umi Sling is currently made-to-order, please allow for 2 weeks from the time your order is placed. If you need a rush order, please contact me!

Printed instructions will accompany your sling. Learn how to thread your ring sling and more by clicking the Babywearing Basics tab.

Note of Caution: Babies that are younger than twelve weeks, premature, less than 8 lbs, or with respiratory problems, low tone, or developmental delays have a higher risk of suffocation. Please consult with your medical provider before using any baby sling or carrier. Always make sure that baby's airways are unobstructed and he is breathing properly. You should be always be able to "kiss the top of his head."

name: Hope Sewn Medium Zipper Pouch
description:
Made with handmade batiks from Ghana, the purchase of these fabrics help support women who are learning a trade to support their families. 

Fully-lined pouch measuring 8.5" x 11", perfect for journal and other personal items. 

Shipping is 1-3 days after order is received via USPS. Each pouch may differ in pattern slightly but are cut from the same bolt, so the color will be the same. 

Please use the Contact Me form to inquire about special orders or wholesale information!

name: Give a Ring Sling through Project Baby Bilum
description:
Do you think something as simple as a piece of fabric can change a village? We believe it can help. Let's be a catalyst for change in rural Papua New Guinea! 

This listing is for a gift to Project Baby Bilum in collaboration with Adriel Booker from The Mommyhood Memos. A sling will be sewn in our shop and shipped to Adriel in Australia, once we have 40-50 slings. She will take them with her on their next outreach trip to Papua New Guinea.

Become part of a movement that is changing women's lives.

Do you know someone who would like a ring sling AND support Project Baby Bilum? Check out my listing for the Umi Sling, a 100% organic cotton sling. For every Umi sling sold, I will donate one to the Project. It's babywearing with a purpose!

When going through checkout, just use your mailing address, even though a sling will not be coming to you - that way, we can send you a thank you card :)

If you'd like to gift a ring sling in someone's name, include their info in the Note to Seller, so we can send them a thank you card and certificate!

options.name: Give in the name of someone else
